comments.author: Anders Toxboe
comments.message: You might want to check out ui-patterns.com - a nice UI design pattern library with some pretty cool form patterns.

comments.author: Zach Leatherman
comments.message: Good site! How might one go about submitting a pattern? Personally, I think you could really build a community around that idea, but that would take some real work.

comments.author: Anders Toxboe
comments.message:
Zach: Actually, it's build up as a wiki as it is now - it's just restricted as I write all the base patterns in the first few months of its life. My plan is to open up for both editing and submitting new patterns in a month or two.

If you have any ideas of patterns you would like to see on the site, you're more than welcome to write me a line at anders (at) toxboe (dot) net.

Thanks for the positive feedback, by the way. :-)
